tags.name: daucus-router
tags.description:
Routing wrapper element for Daucus Routes

Wrap the programmatic DaucusRouter for declarative usage.

attributes.name: base-dir
attributes.description: Directory where templates are published, relative to the baseHRef (should end with a '/')

properties.name: baseDir
properties.description: Directory where templates are published, relative to the baseHRef (should end with a '/')

events.name: route-redirection
events.description: A navigation led to a redirection to another route

events.name: route-match
events.description: A corresponding route was found for a navigation

events.name: project-change
events.description: A navigation led to a route from another Daucus Project
